DOC.brief_title: Evaluation CureXcell® Treating Chronic Venous Leg Ulcers
DOC.criteria: Ankle Brachial Pressure Index ( ABI ) ≥ 0.80 Venous insufficiency confirm duplex Doppler ultrasound Presence venous leg ulcer , unresponsive Standard Care treatment least 4 week ≥ 1 cm2 ≤ 17.1 cm2 screening ; ≥ 1 cm2 ≤ 12cm2 Baseline Visit Target Ulcer decrease > 30 % size Screening Baseline Documented history osteomyelitis Target Ulcer location within 6 month precede Baseline Visit . Patients unable tolerate multilayer compression therapy . Ulcer , opinion Investigator suspicious cancer .
